message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is quite tight. Would you consider lowering the price to $9500?
I understand that you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I can meet you halfway at $11000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would you be open to selling the product for $10500?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $11500. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
I understand your position, Alice. Given my budget, I am willing to pay up to $11000 for the product. Can we agree on this price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell at $11000. I'll meet you halfway between $11000 and $12000, so I'll offer it to you for $11500. This is my last offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $11250 for the product. This is my final offer to you, Alice.

I'm surprised you're willing to pay $11250, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell at that price. I'll meet you halfway between $11250 and $12000, so I'll offer it to you for $11625. This is my last offer, so I hope you can meet me here.
After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $11437.50 for the product. This is my final offer to you, Alice.
